return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:history});})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:targetRef,children:"now_loading"})]})]});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{});}}export default User_page;
